g.text: Help Desk Services Manager
:System
initiates the request to add/update a field in a service draft
asks if the user pretends to use an existing draft
responds
alt
[if the user pretends to use an existing draft]
presents the draft list and asks the user to choose a draft
chooses a draft
loop
[until the user doesn't want to add more fields]
asks which field does the user pretend to add/update
chooses the field
requests the user to insert the field
selects the field
alt
[if the user chooses to add keywords]
loop
[until there is no more keywords to add]
requests the user to insert the keyword
inserts the keyword
asks if the user wants to add more keywords
responds
[if the user chooses to any other field]
requests the user to insert the keyword
selects the field
saves the field in the draft and
asks if there is more fields to add
responds
validates, presents the current
information in the draft and asks for confirmation
confirms
registers the draft in the persistence
and informs of the success of the operation
